articles.title: Baby Great White Shark Caught on Camera for First Time » Explorersweb - ExplorersWeb
articles.description: Researchers have captured footage of a newborn great white shark for the first time. Where and when great whites give birth has long been a mystery.
articles.content: Researchers have captured footage of a newborn great white shark for the first time. Great whites are one of the worlds most famous apex predators, yet there is no previous record of a live newborn.… [+2481 chars]
